title: Toxic behvaior bullshitt
body: League has the most fucking troll bullshit reporting software ever, it makes it impossible for people to play jg when the rest of the team is shit. I cant be everywhere at once and when bot and mid and top all get raped and flame like %%%gots and you just tell them to fuck off, it gets turned on you and you get banned. fucking cancerous ass software yall need to update your shit.

replies.body:
Given the crap that I've been going through the past 24 hours, nothing refreshes me more than to see someone so overwhelmingly pathetic with deliberate toxic behavior, that they're willing to go so far as to insult unnamed players on the forums, as if that were any less of a problem. You want to know what your problem with your matches are? The moment someone like you enters with that asinine attitude, games always go south, and very rarely supersede the hate you seem so intent on bringing.

If you want better games, clean up your behavior. Otherwise, you're better off not playing the game.

....?

I think his behavior is ok. If people are flaming me I'd tell them to fuckoff too.

> flame like %%%gots and you just tell them to fuck off, it gets turned on you and you get banned. fucking cancerous ass software yall need to update your shit.

I suspect the software's working fine. Anything that gets replaced with "%%%" on the boards is something Riot's got zero tolerance for, and it will get you a 14 day ban or permaban pretty quick. If you're using that language on the Rift, then yeah, you'll get punished for it.

> it makes it impossible for people to play jg when the rest of the team is shit. I cant be everywhere at once and when bot and mid and top all get raped 

You don't get punished for how bad your teammates are, nor for how much they blame you.

If this post is an example of the language you use when telling someone to "fuck off," then I can definitely understand the ban.

For your future reference, sexual assault related language is not appropriate, and hate speech like the word the board censors for you is typically an immediate 14-day ban if not worse. You can politely tell players to knock it off, or even say "knock it the fuck off, guys" and not get banned, provided you do not fill your entire logs with criticism towards them. If your behavior crosses the line into toxicity, you are punished. It's fairly simple.

It is updated, it is effective, and it seems to be working from how you chose to respond here.

Homophobic slurs like that aren't ok in-game or on the boards. The community is largely against that short of behavior and it won't be tolerated. Everybody has bad games; even Faker, even you. If they are getting hostile about it a sure way to make it worse is to get toxic back at them. Instead, try leading by example and be a positive force in your match. If they don't want to take *constructive and respectful* feedback or direction, leave them alone and do what you can with the team you're given. If they are being jerks in chat, mute them and rely on pings.

Please be respectful on the boards, and don't use language like that slur. Refer to the [Universal Rules](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules) before posting, and I recommend just taking a breather for the moment so you can collect your thoughts if you're frustrated.
How about just muting them instead of telling them to fuck off?

*reads title then reads up to the first "shit"*

I literally didn't read the full post, deserved.
